name: Clandestine: Anomaly
blurb: Clandestine: Anomaly - The next step in mobile gaming. The frontline is everywhere...

rewards.reward: No Reward
DIGITAL PRODUCTION BOOKLET\r\n==============================\r\nA digital production booklet and a huge thank you for pledging your support!

THE GAME\r\n==============================\r\nA digital copy of Clandestine: Anomaly Ep 01 (iOS or Android), the viewer app, a set of interactive augmented reality markers and digital production booklet. ***THE GAME WILL BE AVAILABLE APRIL 2014, ALL OTHER ITEMS SHIPS DEC 2013***

THE MUSIC \r\n==============================\r\nA digital copy of Clandestine: Anomaly Ep 01 (iOS or Android), the viewer app, a set of interactive augmented reality markers, digital production booklet, and a digital copy of the original soundtrack. ***THE GAME WILL BE AVAILABLE APRIL 2014, ALL OTHER ITEMS SHIPS DEC 2013***

VITA FAN ============================= This tier includes a digital copy of Clandestine: Anomaly Ep 01 for the Vita, the viewer app (iOS or Android), a set of interactive augmented reality markers, the digital production booklet, and a digital copy of the soundtrack. ***THE GAME WILL BE AVAILABLE SPRING 2014, ALL OTHER ITEMS SHIP DEC 2013***

BETA ACCESS\r\n=============================\r\nExclusive Beta access to the game. Includes exclusive in-game digital beta badge and tester credit. Also includes a digital copy of Clandestine: Anomaly Ep 01 (iOS or Android), the viewer app, a set of interactive augmented reality markers, digital production booklet, and a digital copy of the soundtrack. ***THE GAME WILL BE AVAILABLE APRIL 2014, ALL OTHER ITEMS SHIPS DEC 2013***

T-SHIRT PACK\r\n=============================\r\nInteractive Augmented Reality t-shirt, a digital copy of Clandestine: Anomaly Ep 01 (iOS or Android), the viewer app, a set of interactive augmented reality markers, digital production booklet, and a digital copy of the soundtrack. ***THE GAME WILL BE AVAILABLE APRIL 2014, ALL OTHER ITEMS SHIPS DEC 2013***

MAP PACK \r\n=============================\r\nInteractive AR Earth Map, a digital copy of Clandestine: Anomaly Ep 01 (iOS or Android), the viewer app, a set of interactive augmented reality markers, digital production booklet, and a digital copy of the soundtrack. ***THE GAME WILL BE AVAILABLE APRIL 2014, ALL OTHER ITEMS SHIPS DEC 2013***

VITA EXCLUSIVE ============================= Includes a Vita Exclusive Augmented Reality t-shirt, a digital copy of Clandestine: Anomaly Ep 01 (Vita), the viewer app (iOS or Android), a set of interactive augmented reality markers, the digital production booklet, and a digital copy of the soundtrack. ***THE GAME WILL BE AVAILABLE SPRING 2014, ALL OTHER ITEMS SHIP DEC 2013***

DELUXE PACK\r\n=============================\r\nInteractive AR Earth Map, Interactive AR t-shirt, a digital copy of Clandestine: Anomaly Ep 01 (iOS or Android), the viewer app, a set of interactive augmented reality markers, digital production booklet, and a digital copy of the soundtrack. ***THE GAME WILL BE AVAILABLE APRIL 2014, ALL OTHER ITEMS SHIPS DEC 2013***

VITA PREMIUM ============================= \r\nIncludes a Vita Exclusive Augmented Reality t-shirt, a digital copy of Clandestine: Anomaly Ep 01 (Vita), the viewer app (iOS or Android), a physical set of interactive augmented reality markers, a physical production booklet, and a physical copy of the soundtrack, and the AR ancient hologram communicator. ***THE GAME WILL BE AVAILABLE SPRING 2014, ALL OTHER ITEMS SHIP DEC 2013***

HOLOGRAM PACK\r\n=============================\r\nAR ancient hologram communicator, a digital copy of Clandestine: Anomaly Ep 01 (iOS or Android), the viewer app, a set of interactive augmented reality markers, digital production booklet, and a digital copy of the soundtrack. ***THE GAME WILL BE AVAILABLE APRIL 2014, ALL OTHER ITEMS SHIPS DEC 2013***

EXCLUSIVE PACK (EARLY BIRD)\r\n=============================\r\nExclusive poster by famed comic book artist Doug Wheatley, Interactive AR t-shirt, a digital copy of Clandestine: Anomaly Ep 01 (iOS or Android), the viewer app, a set of interactive augmented reality markers, digital production booklet, and a digital copy of the soundtrack. ***THE GAME WILL BE AVAILABLE APRIL 2014, ALL OTHER ITEMS SHIPS DEC 2013***

EXCLUSIVE PACK\r\n=============================\r\nExclusive poster by famed comic book artist Doug Wheatley, Interactive AR t-shirt, a digital copy of Clandestine: Anomaly Ep 01 (iOS or Android), the viewer app, a set of interactive augmented reality markers, digital production booklet, and a digital copy of the soundtrack. ***THE GAME WILL BE AVAILABLE APRIL 2014, ALL OTHER ITEMS SHIP DEC 2013***

COMMAND CENTER (EARLY BIRD)\r\n=============================\r\nEverything you need to build your own personal command center. In-game AR companion that is at your side the ENTIRE game! AR ancient hologram communicator, Interactive AR Earth Map, Interactive AR t-shirt, a digital copy of Clandestine: Anomaly Ep 01 (iOS or Android), the viewer app, a set of interactive augmented reality markers, digital production booklet, and a digital copy of the soundtrack. ***THE GAME WILL BE AVAILABLE APRIL 2014, ALL OTHER ITEMS SHIP DEC 2013***

COMMAND CENTER\r\n=============================\r\nEverything you need to build your own personal command center. In-game AR companion that is at your side the ENTIRE game! AR ancient hologram communicator, Interactive AR Earth Map, Interactive AR t-shirt, a digital copy of Clandestine: Anomaly Ep 01 (iOS or Android), the viewer app, a set of interactive augmented reality markers, digital production booklet, and a digital copy of the soundtrack. ***THE GAME WILL BE AVAILABLE APRIL 2014, ALL OTHER ITEMS SHIPS DEC 2013***

LIFE SIZED AR STATUE OF YOU\r\n=============================\r\nYes, that\u2019s right, a life-sized Augmented Reality statue of you in the game! Limited to just 50 spots, you will be placed in the city of your choice throughout the game world. You also receive an Interactive AR Earth Map, Interactive AR t-shirt, a digital copy of Clandestine: Anomaly Ep 01 (iOS or Android), the viewer app, a set of interactive augmented reality markers, digital production booklet, and a digital copy of the soundtrack. ***THE GAME WILL BE AVAILABLE APRIL 2014, ALL OTHER ITEMS SHIPS DEC 2013***

COLOSSAL AR STATUE OF YOU\r\n=============================\r\nAn epic, 93 meter story tall statue of you in augmented reality. That's as large as the Statue of Liberty! These statues are viewable by any player within the game via Map or on location in augmented reality. Featuring you in a heroic pose, each statue will include an in-universe story about all the deeds you accomplished to deserve such a massive monument. Limited to one per region. You also receive everything at the COMMAND CENTER level. ***THE GAME WILL BE AVAILABLE APRIL 2014, ALL OTHER ITEMS SHIP DEC 2013***

ORIGINAL ARTWORK BY DOUG WHEATLEY\r\n=============================\r\nThe one and only original copy of Doug Wheatley\u2019s game poster for Clandestine: Anomaly. Signed and one of a kind. You also receive everything at the COMMAND CENTER level. ***THE GAME WILL BE AVAILABLE APRIL 2014, ALL OTHER ITEMS SHIP DEC 2013***

BECOME A CHARACTER\r\n=============================\r\nWork with J. C. Hutchins to create a character based off of yourself or work with us to create a unique fictional character. Together we\u2019ll create an backstory and put your character in an epic scene within the game. Limited to 4. You also receive everything at the COMMAND CENTER level. ***THE GAME WILL BE AVAILABLE APRIL 2014, ALL OTHER ITEMS SHIP DEC 2013***

THE ENGINEER\r\n=============================\r\nWork with our creative team to design 3 complete units composed of 9 unique parts. You will get the original artwork connected to these units, as well as a credit for your collaborative design! Limited to 2.  You also receive everything at the COMMAND CENTER level. ***THE GAME WILL BE AVAILABLE APRIL 2014, ALL OTHER ITEMS SHIP DEC 2013***
